metadata.title: CVE-2017-16853 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The DynamicMetadataProvider class insaml/saml2/metadata/impl/DynamicMetadataProvider.cpp in OpenSAML-C inOpenSAML before 2.6.1 fails to properly configure itself with theMetadataFilter plugins and does not perform critical security checks suchas signature verification, enforcement of validity periods, and otherchecks specific to deployments, aka CPPOST-105.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsaml8v5 - 2.5.5-1ubuntu0.1
opensaml2-schemas - 2.5.5-1ubuntu0.1
opensaml2-tools - 2.5.5-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensaml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.5-1ubuntu0.1').
